biotools.summary: TFBScluster is a web tool designed to identify clusters of transcription factor binding sites (TFBSs) conserved in mammalian and mouse genomes. By entering a specified range of TFBS, you can retrieve a list of SWISS-PROT characterized genes to which the clusters are localized.

bioschemas.name: TFBScluster
bioschemas.summary: TFBScluster is a web tool designed to identify clusters of transcription factor binding sites (TFBSs) conserved in mammalian and mouse genomes. By entering a specified range of TFBS, you can retrieve a list of SWISS-PROT characterized genes to which the clusters are localized.
